item.description:
HEY SSDOMG MEMBERS!!


Is anyone in the mood for ICE CREAM?!?


Announcing a last-minute SSDOMG event!!


Friday Night Ice Cream Social!!!

Location: Cold Stone Creamery @ Derby Street Shoppes in Higham (On Route 53, less than one mile from Exit 15 off Route 3)

Time: Approximately 8:15pm

Meeting Place: Outside Cold Stone Creamery

Costs and Fees: $1 event fee per person, pay for your own ice cream (prices range from $3 to $12+)

Min/Max & Guests: Ice Cream Rules! No min, no max, up to 3 Guests (including children as long as you maintain responsibility for them)

Organizer: Angela :)


Can you join us? Please follow these simple instructions to let us know either way.

1. RSVP: Yes (Definitely Interested, Plan to See You There!), Maybe (Not sure yet, but interested!), or No (Sorry, Not Interested or Not Available!)

3. Log-in and Update your RSVP if you are no longer able to attend by 6pm on Friday.

We will be expecting all those who said YES and hope to see all those who said MAYBE.

Please Note: These are approximate directions. For exact directions please use mapquest.com or call the venue.



(Excited to see last-minute events? Please let us know by going to the Message Board, clicking on this subject (there will be a line under it) and then clicking ?Add a Reply? to let us know if you like the idea of last-minute events and/or ice cream socials.)


(Please Note: The RSVP List was printed at 5pm on Fri 7/27. Anyone who made an RSVP after this time will not be noted. Please email the Organizer!)

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: ICE CREAM SOCIAL!!!
